special_text:
[+1]: Scry 2. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.
[-2]: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except the token is 4/4 and has vigilance.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards” and “Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each card you've drawn this turn.”
